message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper deals with the establishment of secure communication links and proposes a protocol to enhance security. This falls under the purview of information theory.
2. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper focuses on secure communication and proposes a scheme to maximize secure throughput. This is a key area of research in cryptography and security.
3. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper discusses the establishment of secure communication links between smart-meters and an aggregator. This involves networking and internet architecture.
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes a protocol to enhance security and assesses its performance in closed-form. This involves systems and control.
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper applies the proposed idea in a smart grid application to exemplify that Eve may not be able to properly reconstruct the average power demand curve. This involves multimedia applications in smart grids.
